Region of Peloponnese in Greece to host ABTA Travel Convention in 2015

ABTA is delighted to announce that Costa Navarino in the Region of Peloponnese in the Greek region of Messinia will host the ABTA 2015 Travel Convention. The Convention will take place from 12-14 October.

Costa Navarino is a luxury coastal resort complex in the area of Messinia in the south western Peloponnese and offers access to numerous world heritage sites including Olympia and the temple of Apollo Epicurius. This will be first time that Greece has hosted the Convention since Kos in 2000.

Convention highlights
Over the two days attendees enjoyed a packed programme where technology – ecommerce, content marketing, mobile - featured strongly. But we were left very much with a sense that technology is most effective and relevant when it is an enabler of people – whether that is to support travel professionals in better marketing and selling to their customers, or in helping customers to discover and learn more about their holidays.
